author: tomekopo
msg: CXF-2878: Polished browsing feature. Added missing features like last, first page and refreshing. Change implementation to support ATOM-XML mime type. Added indicator when loading log entries from server. Fix layout bugs.

author: fdmanana
msg: Replacing call couch_httpd_db:couch_doc_open/4 with call to couch_db:open_doc/2.
It's more correct from a design point of view.

author: clement
msg: Add a specification attribute to the @ServiceController
Modify the PRovidedServiceHandler to support this attribute
Parse this attribute in the manipulator

author: gbrown
msg: Update BXML upgrade script to use BXMLSerializer rather than BeanSerializer.
